home_l1: Choose a maximum travel time from the starting point of Berlin
home_l2: Choose a trainline in order to see which cycling routes can be reached with the chosen trainline
home_l4: Click on a section of the cycling route in order to see how long the distance to the next train station is
home_p1: There are a lot of long distant cycling routes in and around Berlin. They are easily accessible by regional trains. In regional trains you can transport your bicycle. Which cycling routes are there and which train stations are along the route?
home_subheadline: Around Berlin with bike and train
nolegchosen: No route leg chosen: Please click on the cycling path in order to show the details of a cycling route leg.
privacy_l1: Used data: User data such as visited pages, times of visits, meta or communication data (e. g. information about devices and IP addresses).
privacy_l3: Purposes of data usage: Delivery of this website.
privacy_l4: Legal basis: Legitimate interests (Art. 6 Abs. 1 S. 1 lit. f. DSGVO).
privacy_l5: Mail delivery and hosting: The hosting services also include the sending, receiving and saving of emails. For this purpose, the addresses of the sender and receiver of emails as well as further information about emailing (like provider information), and content of mails are processed. They can also be used to detect SPAM. Please note that emails generally aren't sent encrypted. Usually emails are encrypted while sent, but not on the servers receiving and sending the emails. So I take no responsibility for the way emails are received and stored on the server.
privacy_l6: Collection of access data and logfiles: Me or the hosting provider read the data of logfiles. That can be addresses and name of accessed websites, time stamp and date of visit, information about data and size of data requested from the server, success messages, browser including version number, the operating system of the visitor, referrer URL (websites visited before) and usually the IP address and the related provider. The server logfiles can be used for security purposes like prevention of server attacks (especially DDOS attacks) and maintaining the stability of the server.
privacy_l7: Deleting data: Information of logfiles are usually saved for 30 days and then deleted or anonymised. Data that require further saving for the purpose of proof of an incident are temporarily excluded by that rule.
privacy_l8: Hosting platform for e-commerce / Websites; Service provider: 1&1 IONOS SE, Elgendorfer Str. 57, 56410 Montabaur, Germany; Website:
privacy_p1: Unless no email is sent to the email address mentioned on the legal notice page, no user data is taken by this site. Also, no data is sent to external services. But data is used by the hosting provider IONOS (see following information for further details).
privacy_p2:
In order to provide this online service in an efficient and secure way, I use the services of the webhosting provider IONOS. This website is hosted on their servers. This way, I can use their webspace, platform services, data bases and security services.
For their service, they use the data of website visitors like IP addresses, in order to deliver the site content to the visitor and all user input on the site.
privacy_p3: Additional information about processes and services:
